p:
The extracellular lipase from S. caprae NCU S6 (SCNL) was purified by three purification steps, ASP, GFC and IEC. As shown in Table 4, the activity (502.76â€‰U/mg) of the purified SCNL was increased by 332.95-fold, with approximately 6.13% recovery of overall yield. Among the three purification steps, GFC and IEC were found to be critical for obtaining highly purified lipase
17 .
